name: WeaveBall!
description:
"WeaveBall" an original game, designed and created in 3 days by Peter G Tinsley (VP) for the "DO YOUR BEST" ITCH.io game-jam, using the "Free Edition" of Ambiera's Coppercube game-engine. No scripting used!

There are 3 parts to the game:
1- Intro Screen.
Press "1", "2" or "3" to select difficulty level.
2- Pitch & Bat.
Hit the ball, press the Spacebar exactly as the pitcher's hand flashes.
3- WeaveBall.
Press "A" or "D" to move the ball and avoid being caught.

There are 3 Difficulty-levels:
1- Easy mode.
Strikes are cleared at the start of each new level.
2- Medium Difficulty.
Strikes are not cleared between levels.
3- Hard Difficulty.
Strikes are not cleared and player starts with a 2 strike penalty.

Play for score!
Points are awarded for hitting the ball and successfully evading capture.
Last score is recorded on the Home-screen.
